<p>
HEADQUARTERS ARMY OP THE UNITED STATES, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?city=st. louis" rel="city">ST. Louis</a>, Mo., Dec. 10, <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1874">1874</a>. 
</p><p>
Dear Brother: I have just received from the President's secretary a note, saying he may want me to 
attend a dinner and reception he proposes to give the 
King of the Sandwich Islands, and I have answered that 
on a two days' notice I can be there. . . . 
</p><p>
Affectionately, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=wts" rel="me">W. T. SHERMAN</a>. 
</p>
